dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.cbe.usage.Usage
dataStructure.description:
An occurrence of employing a Product, Service, or Resource for its intended purpose, which is of a billing system's interest and can have charges applied to it. It is comprised of characteristics, which represent attributes of usage.

This entity is abstract

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: Usage

child.name: usageDate
child.description:
The date the usage was created.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: usageDate

child.name: usageStatus
child.description:
The condition of the usage, such as new, processed.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: usageStatus

child.name: usageCharacteristicValue
